set-table-horizontal-alignment-left.label: t__Align left
set-table-horizontal-alignment-left.description: t__Align the content of the entire table to its left.

set-table-horizontal-alignment-right.label: t__Align right
set-table-horizontal-alignment-right.description: t__Align the content of the entire table to its right.

set-table-horizontal-alignment-center.label: t__Align center
set-table-horizontal-alignment-center.description: t__Center the content of the entire table.

set-table-horizontal-alignment-justify.label: t__Justify
set-table-horizontal-alignment-justify.description: t__Justify the content of the entire table.

set-table-horizontal-alignment-char.label: t__Character
set-table-horizontal-alignment-char.description: t__Align the content of the entire table on a specific character.

set-table-vertical-alignment-top.label: t__Align top
set-table-vertical-alignment-top.description: t__Align the content of the entire table to its top.

set-table-vertical-alignment-bottom.label: t__Align bottom
set-table-vertical-alignment-bottom.description: t__Align the content of the entire table to its bottom.

set-table-vertical-alignment-center.label: t__Align center
set-table-vertical-alignment-center.description: t__Center the content of the entire table.
